info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 3:07PM EDT until June 27 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Berks County in eastern Pennsylvania... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 307 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fredericksburg, or 7 miles north of Lebanon, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Kutztown, Hamburg, Womelsdorf, Leesport, Shoemakersville, Bernville, Strausstown, Lenhartsville, Fairview Hgts and Centerport. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 10 and 44. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
